snippet: Mr. Keegan was an Englishman widely considered to be the pre-eminent military historian of his era and the author of more than 20 books, including the masterwork “The Face of Battle.”
abstract: John Keegan, Englishman widely considered to be the pre-eminent military historian of his era and the author of more than 20 books, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Keegan was an Englishman widely considered to be the pre-eminent military historian of his era and the author of more than 20 books, including the masterwork “The Face of Battle.”

headline.main: John Keegan, Historian Who Put a Face on War, Dies at 78
headline.print_headline: John Keegan, Historian of War and Warriors, Dies at 78
